summary: Completed comprehensive UI/UX Overhaul testing. Successfully verified all requested features including 'New Synthesis' gradient header, 'CHEM.AI' brand gradient text, sidebar hover effects, theme toggle with Indigo primary colors, EDITOR tab with Designer toolbar, 3D Viewer container styling with rounded corners and borders, and Input Prompt textarea focus ring styling. All backend APIs working perfectly with 5/5 tests passed.
passed_tests: Dashboard loads successfully with CHEM.AI branding
'New Synthesis' gradient header visible with proper gradient classes (bg-gradient-to-r from-foreground to-foreground/60 bg-clip-text text-transparent)
'CHEM.AI' brand gradient text verified with gradient classes (bg-gradient-to-r from-foreground to-foreground/70 bg-clip-text text-transparent)
Sidebar hover effects working on Dashboard and Experiments items
Theme toggle working - successfully switches between dark and light modes
EDITOR tab switching functional with REAL-TIME SYNC indicator
Designer toolbar visible in editor mode with JSME molecular editor
3D Viewer container styling verified - rounded corners (16px border-radius) and borders (2px solid)
Input Prompt textarea focus ring styling confirmed with focus:ring classes and proper box-shadow
Molecule generation working - aspirin molecule generated and visualized in 3D
Backend API connectivity - Root endpoint responding (200 OK)
Molecule generation API - Aspirin generation successful with 2 models
Molecule generation API - Single model generation working (caffeine)
History API - 33 generation records retrieved successfully
Error handling API - Proper validation for empty prompts (422 status)

success_percentage.integration: 100% (Theme toggle, tab switching, molecule generation all working)
